text: D.C. United is a Major League Soccer league soccer (or football) team that plays in Washington, D.C. in the United States. Its nickname is "the Black- and-Red". == League title == * Major League Soccer : 4 ** 1996, 1997, 1999, 2004 == League position == Season League Position 1996 Major League Soccer Champions 1997 Major League Soccer Champions 1998 Major League Soccer Final 1999 Major League Soccer Champions 2000 Major League Soccer 4th / East 2001 Major League Soccer 4th / East 2002 Major League Soccer 5th / East 2003 Major League Soccer Quarterfinals 2004 Major League Soccer Champions 2005 Major League Soccer Quarterfinals 2006 Major League Soccer Semifinals 2007 Major League Soccer Quarterfinals 2008 Major League Soccer 6th / East ==References== Category:Major League Soccer teams Category:1995 establishments in the United States Category:1990s establishments in Washington, D.C.
title: D.C. United
